fi.explorator

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.explorator.Grid

  • public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    2D grid which represents the area where the starting point and ending point of the path resides. Grid cells are being numbered starting from zero at top-left corner and raising up by one when going right. This number is being used to identify the cell in the grid. This is the main composite object which holds the Cell and Edge instances. This works as data transfer object between visualization layer and path finding algorithms.
